0: Went through Hurricane PatriciaWe were evacuated to Guadalahara for a nightThe organization and staff were magnificentWel organized well trained and eficientA job well done
We had a table overlooking the beautiful beach
The room was very well appointed big bathroom nice shower the beds were very comfortable my only complaint were the squishy pillows
Warren has all kinds of information about PV and is very helpful
They helped us start each day right
The bedroom itself has another large sitting area a queen sized bed and opens into a huge bathroom
In addition the infinity pool was refreshing to have after sitting in the warm sun
Another positive is the proximity to the Marina area which provides a host of excellent eateries bars massage and nail shops etc

the first 2 showers I took were with water pooling around my ankles my husband jimmied it and made it manageable after thatThe food at Las Casitas was good the pools were nice the hotel was clean the fitness facility was really nice and open for long hours
1: Under construction but staff was kind enough to relocate us to Westin
Otherwise the spa is great had a couple of superb deep tissue massages
I will stay there next time I am in the area
2: The second incident was they we checked at the spa to see if the kids could swim in the indoor pool in the spa and staff person gave us a tour and said that it was okay
Be sure to ask for a recently upgraded full beach view room and be sure to have a drink at the cevicheria tequila bar in the lobby where there is an amazing tenor singer
and this salmon tasted like it had been dipped in butter and salt
I accidentally left my purse down stairs in the lobby and it was returned to me right away
It has been a couple years since we have stayed at this property
But the front desk needs improvement
Even the beech sales people were of a higher class it seemed
Other than that we had a fantastic time
For Americans who want to travel to another country but only want to be with Americans
We had a pleasant couple of days at the Mariot before a week somewhere else
